the photocatalytic activity of composites was obviously improved.Especially, the 20 b-In 2 S 3 NDCN achieved the maximum formation rate of CO (20.32 lmolAg A1 Ah A1 ) and CH 4 (2.12 lmolAg A1 Ah A1 ) for 10 h, and the apparent quantum efficiency of CO and CH 4 were calculated to be 0.115 and 0.049 respectively, both at 420 nm.As far as the yield of the total products was concerned, 20 b-In 2 S 3 NDCN was 3.7 times higher than that of b-In 2 S 3 and 1.7 times higher than that of NDCN.However, it was worth
